channel.title: Environmental Conservation on Business Directory
channel.description: Recent content in Environmental Conservation on Business Directory

item.title: Sotech General Contracting Limited
item.description:
About Us

Sotech General Contracting Limited specializes in comprehensive design and drafting services, construction, maintenance, and efficient oil spill clean-up solutions. With a commitment to quality and safety, they deliver tailored services to meet diverse client needs.

Our Services

  • Design & Drafting: Professional design and drafting services for construction projects
  • Construction Services: Comprehensive construction solutions for various projects
  • Maintenance: Regular maintenance and upkeep services
  • Oil Spill Clean Up: Specialized environmental cleanup solutions

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Sohan Ramkhalawan
  • Phone: 648-7592 / 310-4331
  • Email: mail@sotechcontracting.com
  • Website: www.sotechcontracting.com

item.title: ELCICS LTD
item.description:
About Us

ELCICS LTD. specializes in the design, installation, and supply of solar PV power plants. With a commitment to sustainable energy solutions, we provide tailored systems that enhance energy efficiency and reduce carbon footprints.

Our Services

  • Solar PV Design: Custom design of solar PV power systems for optimal performance
  • Solar Installation: Professional installation of solar PV power plants
  • Solar Equipment Supply: Supply of high-quality solar PV components and systems

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Len Gervais
  • Phone: 683-7705 / 682-1490
  • Email: eclicsltd.tt2017@gmail.com
  • Website: www.elcicsltdtt.com

item.title: Rawle Ramcharan Transport Services
item.description:
About Us

Rawle Ramcharan Transport Services specializes in efficient and reliable trash collection services. Committed to sustainability and customer satisfaction, we ensure timely pickups and responsible waste management for both residential and commercial clients.

Our Services

  • Trash Collection: Professional waste collection for residential and commercial clients
  • Regular Pickups: Scheduled and reliable collection service
  • Waste Management: Responsible disposal and waste management

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Rawle Ramcharan
  • Phone: +1 868 739 7588
  • Slogan: “Your trash is my cash”

Business Hours

Monday - Saturday: 6:00 AM - 6:00 PM Sunday: By Appointment
